page.title: 08A PRIMARY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: At seven o'clock I have to get up to go to school .I go and have my breakfaat. I have a bowl of cereals and then get dressed. Then at 7.55 a.m. I go to call for my friends and walk to school. The regestration bell goes at 8.50 a.m. and after the register has been taken we have reading followed by English until playtime at 10.20 a.m. After playtime at 10.35 a.m. we have a lesson of Mathematics where we do investigations.When Mathematics has finished we have a dinner break (11.50 -12.50). I have school dinners and then go out to play football on the school field with my friends.After lunch we have lessons of History and P.E until I go home at 3.15 p.m.When I get home I watch television until I go to bed .
